column2: "Na ɔkɛhɛɛn nhyiamudan no mu bio; na nyimpa bi wɔ hɔ a ne nsa adwedwe."
"Na wɔtsɛɛw no hwɛɛ dɛ ɔbɛyɛ no edur ahomgyeda no
"Na ɔsee nyimpa no a ne nsa adwedwe no dɛ
"Na obisaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana ɔfa mbra mu dɛ ahomgyeda wɔbɛyɛ dza oye
column4: anaa wɔbɛyɛ dza omuo? Wɔbɛgye nkwa

column2: "Na womuaa hɔn ano. Na ɔhwɛɛ hɔn hyiae ebufuw do
column3: na hɔn akoma dzen ntsi ɔyɛɛ no yaw no
column5: Tsen wo nsa.  Na ɔtsenee; na ne nsa no sanee dzii mu."

column2: "Na Farisiifo no puei
column3: na ntsɛmara wɔnye Herod akadofo kɛfaa apam wɔ mbrɛ wɔbɛyɛ asɛɛ no ho."

column2: "Na Jesus nye n’esuafo no twee hɔnho kɔr mpoano; na nyimpadodow pii fii Galilii kaa no do;"
"na wofi Judea
column7: nyimpadodow pii a wɔtsee ndzɛmba akɛse pii a ɔyɛe no

column2: "Na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ n’esuafo no dɛ wɔnyɛ hɛn kakraba bi krado ntweɔn no wɔ nyimpadodow no ntsi

column3: dodowara a mbusu horow aba hɔn do no bɛkyeer no do dɛ worubosusuo no mu."

column2: "Na oyii duebien
column5: "na dɛ ɔbɔsoma hɔn ama wɔaakɛka asɛm no na woeenya tum dze etu mbɔnsam."

column2: "Na Simon ɔtoo no dzin Peter
column5: nye James no nua John; na ɔtoo hɔn dzin Boanerges

column2: "nye Andrew
column11: nye Judas Iskariot a ɔno na oyii no mae no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa fie; na nyimpadodow no behyiaa bio
column3: ma dɛm ntsi woenntum enndzidzi mpo."

column2: "Na n’ebusuafo no tsee no
column3: wofiir edzi dɛ wɔrobɔtwe no akɔ

column2: "Na kyerɛwfo no a wofi Jerusalɛm bae no see dɛ
column4: na mbɔnsam hɔn panyin do na ɔnam tu mbɔnsam no."

column2: "Na ɔfrɛɛ hɔn baa ne nkyɛn no
column4: Ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na Satan botum etu Satan?"

column2: "Na sɛ ahenman nye no ho dzi mpaapaamu a
"Na sɛ ofi nye no ho dzi mpaapaamu a

column2: "osiandɛ wɔsee dɛ
"Na ne na nye no nuanom bae begyinaa abow no enyim somae ma wɔkɛfrɛɛ no."
"Nna nyimpadodow tsetse ne nkyɛn
column5: wo na nye wo nuanom gyina abow enyim rohwehwɛ wo."

column2: "Na obuae see hɔn dɛ
column3: Woana nye me na nye mo nuanom?"

column2: "Na ɔtoo n’enyi hwɛɛ hɔn a wɔtsetse ne nkyɛn hyiae no
